title: Backlog credits
content: I wrote my phy backlog and cleared it with E grade but Iâ€™ve only got 4/5 credits.. this is only the provisional results but why did I not get the 1 credit? Any idea? Who should I go meet?

comments.body: Reach out to COE and/or HOD. Ideally you should have gotten the full credit for the course.
he changed it to 5, Thank you so much!
